casebody.data:
No. 10-6080. Christopher Stoller, Petitioner v. Court of Appeals of Arizona, Division One, et al. 562 U.S. 998, 131 S. Ct. 515,

178 L. Ed. 2d 365,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8391. November 1, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Arizona dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
